short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find information faster and filter out spam domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearchMage helps you to find information faster and to filter out spam domains that clutter the search results.

Features:
- Supports many search engines like Google Search
- Optional automatic infinite scrolling for all supported search engines
- Block selected domains or URLs from search results (regexp supported)
- Simple unified search interface for all supported search engines with date range, sorting, category and profile options
- Supports search profiles where search is limited to your selected domains
- Keyboard shortcuts for navigating between search page results and within the search popup
- Large navigation (prev/next page) buttons and result page links for Google Search
- Optional Load More-button for loading the next page results inline for all supported search engines
- Custom CSS stylesheet support (allows e.g. dark mode)
- Built-in optional Dark Theme
- Favicon support for search engine results
- Optional open link in a new tab button
- Block results in search view by clicking X-icon
- Predictive search results in the popup
- Predictive search can optionally include previously visited sites (history)
- Optional addition of result order numbers to search results
